00024 using System;
00025 using System.Runtime.InteropServices;
00026 using System.Collections.Generic;
00027 
00028 namespace ZBar
00029 {
00033     public class Image : IDisposable
00034     {
00035         private IntPtr handle;
00036         
00047         internal Image(IntPtr handle, bool incRef){
00048             this.handle = handle;
00049             if(this.handle == IntPtr.Zero)
00050                 throw new Exception("Can't create an image from a null pointer!");
00051             //If we must increment the reference counter here
00052             if(incRef)
00053                 zbar_image_ref(this.handle, 1);
00054         }
00055         
00063         public Image(){
00064             this.handle = zbar_image_create();
00065             if(this.handle == IntPtr.Zero)
00066                 throw new Exception("Failed to create new image!");
00067         }
00068         
00075         public Image(string filename){
00076             this.handle = zbar_image_read(filename);
00077             if(this.handle == IntPtr.Zero)
00078                 throw new Exception("Failed to load image from: " + filename);
00079         }
00080         
00084         internal IntPtr Handle{
00085             get{
00086                 
00087                 return this.handle;
00088             }
00089         }
00090         
00091         #region Wrapper methods
00092         
00107         public void Dump(string filebase){
00108             if(zbar_image_write(this.handle, filebase) != 0)
00109                 throw new ZBarException(this.handle);
00110         }
00111         
00115         public uint Width{
00116             get{
00117                 return zbar_image_get_width(this.handle);
00118             }
00119             set{
00120                 zbar_image_set_size(this.handle, value, this.Height);
00121             }
00122         }
00123         
00127         public uint Height{
00128             get{
00129                 return zbar_image_get_height(this.handle);
00130             }
00131             set{
00132                 zbar_image_set_size(this.handle, this.Width, value);
00133             }
00134         }
00135         
00140         public uint Format{
00141             get{
00142                 return zbar_image_get_format(this.handle);
00143             }
00144             set{
00145                 zbar_image_set_format(this.handle, value);
00146             }
00147         }
00148         
00152         public uint SequenceNumber{
00153             get{
00154                 return zbar_image_get_sequence(this.handle);
00155             }
00156             set{
00157                 zbar_image_set_sequence(this.handle, value);
00158             }
00159         }
00160         
00165         public byte[] Data{
00166             get{
00167                 IntPtr pData = zbar_image_get_data(this.handle);
00168                 if(pData == IntPtr.Zero)
00169                     throw new Exception("Image data pointer is null!");
00170                 uint length = zbar_image_get_data_length(this.handle);
00171                 byte[] data = new byte[length];
00172                 Marshal.Copy(pData, data, 0, (int)length);
00173                 return data;
00174             }
00175             set{
00176                 IntPtr data = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(value.Length);
00177                 Marshal.Copy(value, 0, data, value.Length);
00178                 zbar_image_set_data(this.handle, data, (uint)value.Length, new zbar_image_cleanup_handler(ReleaseAllocatedUnmanagedMemory));
00179             }
00180         }
00181         
00182         private static void ReleaseAllocatedUnmanagedMemory(IntPtr image) {
00183             IntPtr pData = zbar_image_get_data(image);
00184             if(pData != IntPtr.Zero)
00185                 Marshal.FreeHGlobal(pData);
00186         }
00187         
00191         public IEnumerable<Symbol> Symbols{
00192             get{
00193                 IntPtr pSym = zbar_image_first_symbol(this.handle);
00194                 while(pSym != IntPtr.Zero){
00195                     yield return new Symbol(pSym);
00196                     pSym = Symbol.zbar_symbol_next(pSym);
00197                 }
00198             }
00199         }
00200         
00212         public Image Convert(uint format){
00213             IntPtr img = zbar_image_convert(this.handle, format);
00214             if(img == IntPtr.Zero)
00215                 throw new Exception("Conversation failed!");
00216             return new Image(img, false);
00217         }
00218         
00219         #endregion
00220         
00221         #region IDisposable Implementation
00222         //This pattern for implementing IDisposable is recommended by:
00223         //Framework Design Guidelines, 2. Edition, Section 9.4
00224         
00236         protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing){
00237                 if (this.handle != IntPtr.Zero) {
00238                     zbar_image_destroy(this.handle);
00239                     this.handle = IntPtr.Zero;
00240                 }
00241             if(disposing){
00242                 //Release finalizable resources, at the moment none.
00243             }
00244         }
00245 
00249         public void Dispose(){
00250             //We're disposing this object and can release objects that are finalizable
00251             this.Dispose(true);
00252             GC.SuppressFinalize(this);
00253         }
00254         
00258         ~Image(){
00259             //Dispose this object, but do NOT release finalizable objects, we don't know in which order
00260             //these are release and they may already be finalized.
00261             this.Dispose(false);
00262         }
00263         #endregion
00264

00273         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00274         private static extern IntPtr zbar_image_create();
00275

00287         private static extern void zbar_image_destroy(IntPtr image);
00288

00296         private static extern void zbar_image_ref(IntPtr image, int refs);
00297         
00308         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00309         private static extern IntPtr zbar_image_convert(IntPtr image, uint format);
00310

00322         private static extern IntPtr zbar_image_convert_resize(IntPtr image, uint format, uint width, uint height);
00323

00328         private static extern uint zbar_image_get_format(IntPtr image);
00329

00333         private static extern uint zbar_image_get_sequence(IntPtr image);
00334         
00338         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00339         private static extern uint zbar_image_get_width(IntPtr image);
00340         
00344         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00345         private static extern uint zbar_image_get_height(IntPtr image);
00346         
00350         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00351         private static extern IntPtr zbar_image_get_data(IntPtr image);
00352         
00355         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00356         private static extern uint zbar_image_get_data_length(IntPtr img);
00357         
00363         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00364         private static extern IntPtr zbar_image_first_symbol(IntPtr image);
00365         
00372         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00373         private static extern void zbar_image_set_format(IntPtr image, uint format);
00374         
00377         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00378         private static extern void zbar_image_set_sequence(IntPtr image, uint sequence_num);
00379         
00383         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00384         private static extern void zbar_image_set_size(IntPtr image, uint width, uint height);
00385         
00389         private delegate void zbar_image_cleanup_handler(IntPtr image);
00390                 
00396         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00397         private static extern void zbar_image_set_data(IntPtr image, IntPtr data, uint data_byte_length, zbar_image_cleanup_handler cleanup_handler);
00398         
00402         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00403         private static extern void zbar_image_free_data(IntPtr image);
00404         
00407         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00408         private static extern void zbar_image_set_userdata(IntPtr image, IntPtr userdata);
00409         
00412         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00413         private static extern IntPtr zbar_image_get_userdata(IntPtr image);
00414         
00440         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00441         private static extern int zbar_image_write(IntPtr image, string filebase);
00442         
00445         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00446         private static extern IntPtr zbar_image_read(string filename);
00447         #endregion
00448     }
